author: "Bryan Clair"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"

description: >-
   Bookdown Technical Demo by Bryan Clair.
   This has all the technical features of Speegle, Clair "Probability, Statistics, and Data: A Fresh Approach Using R".


# Settings for CRC's krantz.cls
